OTP_SENT: OTP Sent Successfully! It is valid for 10 minutes. Please enter it promptly to complete your registration.
OTP_VERIFIED: Your OTP has been successfully verified. You can now proceed with your registration.
OTP_INCORRECT: The One-Time Password (OTP) you entered is incorrect. Please try again or request a new OTP if needed.
OTP_EXPIRED: The One-Time Password (OTP) you entered is expired. Please try again or request a new OTP.
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: The email address you entered is already associated with an existing account. Please try logging in or use a different email address to sign up.
SUCCESSFUL_REGISTER_MSG: Congratulations! You have successfully registered as a user. You can now log in and start exploring all the features available to you.
referral_code_verify: Your referral code has been successfully verified. Any associated benefits or rewards will be applied to your account.
ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVE: Your account has been deactivated or deleted by the admin. If you believe this is a mistake or need further assistance, please contact our support team.
email_registered_with_social: This email is registered with a social media account. Please try social media login.
LOGIN_SUCCESSFULLY: Welcome! You have successfully logged in. Enjoy your experience.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The login credentials you entered are not correct. Please check your details and try again.
ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVE_DELETED: Unable to login. Your account has been requested for deletion.
data_collection_and_analysis: Data collection and analysis data fetched.
data_collection: Data collection and analysis updated succesfully.
data_collection_not_update: Data collection and analysis not updated succesfully.
SMS_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached your daily limit for sending SMS messages. Please try again tomorrow.
NOT_USER_FOUND_FROM_SOCIALID: No user found from this social id please follow registration process
FAV_ADDED_YOURSELF_ERR_MSG: You Cannot add yourself as favorite
EMAIL_ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email has already been verified. You can proceed with the sign-up process.
RESET_TOKEN_ERROR_INACTIVE_BY_ADMIN: Cannot Reset password for this user as Account is inactived by Admin
INVALID_REQ_TOKEN_EXP: Invalid Request!  Token is expired , Please reset your password again!
INVALID_REQ_LINK_EXP: Invalid Request ! Your Verification Link has Expired !
EMAIL_ALREADY_VERIFIED_LOGIN: User Already Registered with this Email address, Please login to continue.
PHONE_ALREADY_EXISTS: Phone is already exists please enter a different phone number.
ONLINE_STATUS_UPDATED: Your online status has been successfully updated.
ONLINE_STATUS_NOT_UPDATED: Unable to update your online status at the moment.

NOTIFICATION.NEW_CONFERENCE_NOTIFICATION: あなたは次の5分間で電話を受ける
NOTIFICATION.MISSED_CALL_PING_NOTIFICATION: さんは今電話通訳ができます。

NOTIFICATION.YOU_JUST_RECEIVED_NEW_JOB_REQUEST: You just received new job request

NOTIFICATION.PAYMENT_RECEIVED: 支払いを受領しました。
